hero.title: About 123 Brass
hero.subtitle: Precision Brass Forging Excellence
hero.description: 123 Brass is a leading brass and steel forging manufacturer dedicated to delivering high-quality custom solutions. Our commitment to precision and innovation drives us to serve diverse industrial needs with unparalleled expertise.

meta.title: 123 Brass - Precision Forging Manufacturing
meta.description: Specialized brass and steel forging manufacturer in Jamnagar, delivering custom solutions with advanced manufacturing capabilities and industry-leading quality.

items.content: 123 Brass is a premier brass and steel forging manufacturer located in Jamnagar, specializing in custom forging solutions for diverse industrial applications. With advanced manufacturing technologies and a commitment to precision, we deliver high-quality components that meet the most demanding specifications.
